question_answer_pairs.question: Which decision addresses matters relating to the implementation of the Paris Agreement?
On what date was Decision 2/CMA.1 adopted?

question_answer_pairs.answer: It welcomes the entry into force of the Paris Agreement on 4 November 2016.
question_answer_pairs.question: What does Decision 1/CMA.1 state about the entry into force of the Paris Agreement?
Which document is referenced in Decision 2/CMA.1 regarding draft rules 22–26?

question_answer_pairs.answer: It expresses profound gratitude to the Government of the Kingdom of Morocco for hosting the meetings in Marrakech.
question_answer_pairs.question: What does Resolution 1/CMA.1 express gratitude for?

question_answer_pairs.answer: The twenty-second session of the Conference of the Parties
question_answer_pairs.question: Which session of the Conference of the Parties was held in conjunction with the first session of the Paris Agreement?

question_answer_pairs.answer: To review progress on the implementation of the work programme under the Paris Agreement.
question_answer_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the joint meeting mentioned in Decision 1/CMA.1, item 10?
Which article of the Paris Agreement does Decision 2/CMA.1 refer to when discussing rules of procedure?

question_answer_pairs.answer: Decisions taken at the third part of the first session of the Conference of the Parties serving as the meeting of the Parties to the Paris Agreement.
question_answer_pairs.question: According to Decision 1/CMA.1, item III, what will determine the governance of the Adaptation Fund?
Who submitted the draft resolution that became Resolution 1/CMA.1?
